titleStmt.title: Proposals of a new model for rebuilding the city of London with houses, streets, and wharfs to be forthwith set out by His Majesty's and the city surveyors : with the advantages that will accrue by the building the same accordingly.
titleStmt.author: Knight, Val. (Valentine)
